overview:
Len Charni is a Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of triMirror and Quakeup Media Productions, Inc., and is a serial e-commerce entrepreneur.

Prior to triMirror, Len built from scratch and operated a highly popular social networking website from 1999 until its successful sale and exit in 2007. It provided discussion forums, price comparison, educational tutorials and articles, various creative tools, and reviews. By consulting the targeted industry in internet communication and advertising that allows the vendor to participate in its customerâ€™s shopping experience by providing honest advice, knowledge, and support, the company provided a new way for businesses to approach internet advertising in a revolutionary way.

Len holds a Ph.D. in Semiconductors and Crystallography from the Moscow Institute of Steel and Alloys. His professional roles have included Engineer, Scientist, Visiting Scientist, and Research & Development Engineer.
